default.title_faceA: Tap the card to select an answer
default.endtitle_A: We’ll see if your friends know you well!

question_1.question: Do you put the milk before or after the cereal?

question_2.question: What do you prefer to spread your butter on?

question_3.question: How do you like your juice in the morning?
question_3.b: In a juice box from the supermarket
question_3.c: I don’t drink juice in the morning

question_4.question: What do you do during breakfast?

question_5.question: Do you dip your bread in milk?
question_5.b: No, the bread becomes soft afterwards
question_5.c: I prefer dipping it in coffee

question_1.question: Does [partenaireName] pour milk before or after cereal?

question_2.question: what does [partenaireName] like spreading  butter on?

question_3.question: How does [partenaireName] like their juice in the morning?
question_3.b: In a cardboard box  from the supermarket
question_3.c: They don't drink juice in the morning

question_4.question: What does [partenaireName] do while having breakfast?

question_5.question: Does [partenaireName] dip their bread in milk?
question_5.b: No, because the bread becomes soft afterwards
question_5.c: They prefer dipping it in coffee

question_6.question: Does [partenaireName] prefer chocolate bread or croissants?

default.title_faceA: Appuies sur la carte pour répondre aux questions
default.endtitle_A: On verra si tes amis te connaissent bien !

question_1.question: Est-ce que tu mets le lait avant ou après les céréales ?

question_2.question: Sur quoi est-ce que tu préfères étaler ton beurre ?

question_3.question: Ton jus de fruits le matin, tu le préfères:
question_3.a: Fait à la main, avec des oranges préssées
question_3.b: Dans sa brique en carton, venue du supermarché
question_3.c: Je ne bois pas du jus le matin

question_4.question: En prenant ton petit déjeuner tu fais quoi ?

question_5.question: Tu trempes ton pain dans le lait ?
question_5.b: Non, le pain devient tout mou après
question_5.c: Le lait non mais le café oui
